request.description: Implement Gate DSL Enhancement Plan (PLAN_ORCHESTRATION_GATE_DSL_20251221): 1) Create gateParser.ts with tokenizer, AST parser, evaluator for Boolean operators (AND/OR/NOT), thresholds, evidence integration. 2) Create evidenceAutoPopulator.ts for handoff-to-evidence chain automation. 3) Modify gates.ts, handoffs.ts, execution schema, CLI. 4) Test all new functionality. 5) Write Serena memory documenting completion.
